title: 18 Degrees To Love
description: Shivali is messed up in her own world. Forced to take up a career she despises, she is dragging her life bit by bit. The quiet witty beauty suddenly finds herself to be center of attraction in college and several guys fancying her. And then enters Abhilekh in her life. She is startled to find herself having deep emotions for this enigmatic guy who says that he likes her friend but keeps giving her mixed signals.Abhilekh is attracted to Shivali but thinks of her as an attention seeker. When he comes close to her at last, he realizes her simplicity and honesty. He falls for her in the end but on conditions. Will she accept these conditions? Will he trust her?A sweet, amusing, and deeply moving college romance, 18 Degrees to Love is a story which will take you back in time and will stay with you forever.
author: Ankita Guru
